message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth considering a price of $800000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. I can meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer, so I'm willing to consider a price of $700000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $700000. I'm thinking more in the range of $650000. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I also need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

I'm starting to think we're getting closer to a deal. I can see that you're willing to pay a premium for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm thinking a price of $675000 could be a sweet spot. Let's see if we can make a deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still thinking $625000 is a more reasonable price for this product. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be convinced it's a good deal for me.
